title: Oru Malayoram Lyrics Avan Ivan Song Lyrics
singerName: Baby Nithiyashree, Baby Priyanka, Baby Srinisa, Vijay Yesudas
stanzas:
Singers: Vijay Yesudas, Baby Priyanka, 
Baby Srinisa, Baby Nithyashree
Song: Oru Malayoram
Movie : Avan Ivan
Lyrics : Na Muthukumar

Oru Malayoram,
angu konjam Megam,
Adhan adivaaram oru veedu
Un kaikorthu en thalaisaikka, 
angu vendumada en koodu

Chellam konji nee pesa, ullam urugi nan ketka
antha nimidam podhum ada, Inthan jenmam theerum ada
ohhhhhhhhhhhhh..

Oru Malayoram,
angu konjam Megam, Adhan adivaaram oru veedu
Un kaikorthu en thalaisaikka, angu vendumada en koodu

Penne mudhal murai, un arugile vazhkiren
podhum pdohum vidu, ninaivile thoigiren
Enna aanathu enthan nenjam, En indha maatramo
Pen-anathum naanam vandhu, than velaiyai kaatumo
un ethirile .....

Ethuvume pesida Vendaam, mounangal aayiram pesume
En ullirunthu nee pesa, innum enna nan pesa
Inthan mayakkam pothum adi
Innum nerukam vendum adi
ohhhh ooo....

Oru Malayoram,
angu konjam Megam, Adhan adivaaram oru veedu

Unnai kanum varai nan kanavile ..vazhthavan
Unnai kanden penne un ninaivile.. vazhkiren

En thanimaiyin oram vandhu inimaigam ootrinaai
En thaayidam pesum podhum verumaiyai kootinaai
Un kadhalile .......

Manam adhu pugaiyinai pole, maraithathu yaarume illaye
Ennul ne senthirukka, engae ennai naan maraika
Indha vaarthai podhummm adi
Enthan vazhkai maarummm adi
Penne
